    • Method Detail

      • getTransformationData

        org.w3c.dom.Document getTransformationData(YFSEnvironment env,
                                           org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                    throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                           java.rmi.RemoteException

        The getTransformationData API returns a list of transformation data based on custom attributes provided in input XML.
        It retrieves the configuration data from YFS_TRANSFORMATION_CONFIG , transformation data from YFS_TRANSFORMATION_HEADER table.
        and data for specific locale from YFS_TRANS_HEADER_LOCALE table.

        The API retrieves transformation data DocumentName, TemplateCode, OrganizationCode, TemplateName, Description
        based on DocumentType, TemplateCode provided in the input XML.

        • DocumentName specifies the Document Name for the specific Document Type. Eg "Quote" for 0015.
        • TemplateCode specifies the Template Code for the Document Type.It represents the type for which template will be used. E.g:Print Proposal for printing the Proposal.
        • OrganizationCode specifies the Organization Code for an organization.
        • TemplateName specifies the name of different templates for the corresponding Template Code. Eg "Template for Government" for "Print Proposal".
        • Description specifies the description for the corresponding Template.
        • DocumentType specifies the description for the Document Type for which Template has to create. Eg 0015

        Errors and Error Codes

        • YFS10198: Blank XML data.
        • YFS10460: Missing attribute in input.Check for the necessary attributes if TransformationHeader Element present.
        • YSC91B_012: Invalid Configuration Data, like Document Type and Template Code.
        • YFS10367: Invalid Document Type, not match with the entry in table YFS_Document_Params
        • YFS10395: Invalid Organization Code, not match with the entry in table YFS_Organization.

        This API also retrieves the data for the corresponding locale like TemplateName, Description, Template based on the input with DisplayLocalizedFieldInLocale attribute stamped. Locale need to be passed in DisplayLocalizedFieldInLocale, in the standard format of "language_country_variant". e.g fr_FR, en_US_EST.

        Note: This API stamped Document Name for the corresponding Document Type from the YFS_DOCUMENT_PARAMS Table by calling getDocumentTypeList API.
        DocumentType and TemplateCode are mandatory (Unique key Parameters) if want to fetch the configuration data. Primary key TransformationConfigKey will be neglected by the API. DocumentType and TemplateCode are mandatory attributes if the TransformationHeader Element present in Input XML.
        OrganizationCode is required parameter if we have TransformationHeader Element.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits: None

        Events Raised: None

        Audits: None

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None

        Output Template Support: No

        Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inDoc - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.
        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
